tasks.label: Build NES ROM
tasks.command: ca65 src/main.asm; ca65 src/reset.asm; ld65 src/reset.o src/main.o -C nes.cfg -o main.nes

tasks.label: Build Background NES ROM
tasks.command: ca65 src/Fondo/background.asm; ca65 src/Fondo/reset.asm; ld65 src/Fondo/reset.o src/Fondo/background.o -C nes.cfg -o src/Fondo/background.nes
